title: Land for Sale in Colombo 07
details:
Chance to own a Land in one of the most highly residential & demanded locations in Colombo!

Size of Land area : 17 Perches
Facing Main Road & has a 65 feet of a frontage.
Also includes a wide frontage which is ideal to build an apartment complex or a commercial complex.

Amount is just 14 Million per Perch!

Located just at the border of Colombo 07 & 08. A highly demanded and residential location.

Please contact TSL Property on: +94112677534 or
+94766787070 / +94778973140 (Viber / Whatsapp) for more details and to arrange an immediate viewing.
[pictures are model pictures]

We have Many Other properties Available in Colombo that might be ideal with your requirement.
If you are interested, All you have to do is sending us a simple e-mail to: sales@tslproperty.com, specifying your requirements. We are always happy to Help you, Absolutely for FREE!
